remarks: Lemma for strong state theorem: the function ` S ` , that maps a closed subspace to the square of the norm of its projection onto a unit vector, is a state.  This lemma restates the hypotheses in a more convenient form to work with.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
strlem3.1 $e |- S = ( x e. CH |-> ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` x ) ` u ) ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
strlem3.2 $e |- ( ph <-> ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) ) $.
strlem3.3 $e |- A e. CH $.
strlem3.4 $e |- B e. CH $.
strlem3 $p |- ( ph -> S e. States ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
$d u x $.
